name: JMH Java Microbenchmark Harness
description:
Plugin for generating and running JMH benchmarks from your IDE

Source code on GitHub

Getting started

Use it the same way as you use JUnit. To generate a new benchmark method run `Generate...` action. In Mac OS it is `Ctrl + N` Or just right click in your editor pane and select `Generate micro benchmark`. To run a separate benchmark method move the cursor to the method declaration and invoke `Run` action. In Mac OS it is `Ctrl + Shift + F10`. Do the same actions to run all the benchmarks in a class, just move your cursor to the class declaration.
